entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 11:29 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
